title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling programmatic chat, generate, embed, and pull/push model operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for use in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat UI, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs with model management.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app example that connects to a local Ollama instance via the ollama-js client.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers interact with Ollama models through slash commands and threaded chats.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts and GitHub Actions for pulling, benchmarking, and converting models for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an AI pair-programmer.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React, offering model and chat management.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface that connects to Ollama, showcasing session state, streaming, and model selection.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation template using Ollama, LangChain, and Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting app mentions, direct messages, and per-channel model settings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and configurable models list.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app exposing Ollama models via REST endpoints with Swagger docs and async task support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper for Ollama written in Go, adding interactive REPL, prompt templates, and output formatting.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Nim library for communicating with Ollama, providing both sync and async APIs for chat and generate.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama’s HTTP API with GenServer behavior for supervised chat processes.
